summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2381, for the improvement of East 47th Street, form 7th Avenue Northeast to 10th Avenue Northeast; 8th Avenue Northeast, from East 47th Street to East 50th Street; 9th Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to East 50th Street; and 10th Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to East 47th Street; by grading and curbing 24841 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
